org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.format

Interface MessageFormat


  • public interface MessageFormat
    The public API interface that defines a MessageFormat holding the payload

        Get the name of the message format

        Does this message hold updated content?
        Returns:
        true if this payload is modified, or modifies the original message payload

      • detach

        void detach()
        Detach this payload from the Message. Once detached, the recycling or release of any resources held is the responsibility of the user
